snippet: The professional soccer team Shakhtar Donetsk relocated to Kiev because of intense bombardment in the city over the last few months.
abstract: Ukraine's premier soccer team Shakhtar Donetsk has been forced to relocate to Kiev amid turmoil that has rocked its home region in country's east and bombing that damaged its home stadium Donbass Arena.
lead_paragraph: The professional soccer team Shakhtar Donetsk relocated to Kiev because of intense bombardment in the city over the last few months.

headline.main: To Escape Fighting in Ukraine, Shakhtar Donetsk Takes an Indefinite Road Trip
